name: BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.getPrimaryService
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.getPrimaryService() method returns a promise to the primary BluetoothGATTService offered by the bluetooth device for a specified BluetoothServiceUUID.

refs.name: Web Bluetooth
refs.description: The definition of 'getPrimaryService()' in the 'Web Bluetooth' specification.
